Dear All,

Please find attached the confirmation of the delivery of Lemi Spa on 19/06/23.

I have attached a photo report of the items received. The items have been placed in the 1st floor spa, and remained closed to keep clean and hygienic, and ready for the local supplier to assemble and install.

Wishing you a good day,

Best regards

Linton
